alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Walton, Holmes and central Washington Counties through NOON CDT... At 1058 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Bonifay, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Rock Hill, Glendale and Holmes Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
